trans-unit.source: Different types will be differently handled.
trans-unit.target: Different types will be differently handled.

trans-unit.source: This word will be replaces as link to glossary detailpages.
trans-unit.target: This word will be replaces as link to glossary detailpages.

trans-unit.source: Alias will be generated automatically and will be used for term url.
trans-unit.target: Alias will be generated automatically and will be used for term url.

trans-unit.source: Defines width of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.
trans-unit.target: Defines width of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.

trans-unit.source: Defines height of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.
trans-unit.target: Defines height of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.

trans-unit.source: Term will be ignored, if it is contained in one of those html tags.
trans-unit.target: Term will be ignored, if it is contained in one of those html tags.

trans-unit.source: Can be used to sort list by date.
trans-unit.target: Can be used to sort list by date.

trans-unit.source: User will be redirected to this page, after clicking a term.
trans-unit.target: User will be redirected to this page, after clicking a term.

trans-unit.source: User will be redirected to this page, after clicking a term.
trans-unit.target: User will be redirected to this page, after clicking a term.

trans-unit.source: Plural search means, term will be replaced until end of word: Bad-emeister.
trans-unit.target: Plural search means, term will be replaced until end of word: Bad-emeister.

trans-unit.source: Only full words will be replaced by glossary.
trans-unit.target: Only full words will be replaced by glossary.

trans-unit.source: Do not use Term as Headline
trans-unit.target: Do not use Term as Headline

trans-unit.source: This term wont be used as headline, if content element has a headline.
trans-unit.target: This term wont be used as headline, if content element has a headline.

trans-unit.source: A preview text for glossary list and preview layer.
trans-unit.target: A preview text for glossary list and preview layer.

trans-unit.source: Description will be used for abbr-tag.
trans-unit.target: Description will be used for abbr-tag.

trans-unit.source: Includes more options to define, how term will be linked.
trans-unit.target: Includes more options to define, how term will be linked.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the article to which visitors will be redirected when clicking the news item.
trans-unit.target: Please choose the article to which visitors will be redirected when clicking the news item.

trans-unit.source: Make the news item publicly visible on the website.
trans-unit.target: Make the news item publicly visible on the website.

trans-unit.source: Do not show the news item on the website before this day.
trans-unit.target: Do not show the news item on the website before this day.

trans-unit.source: Do not show the news item on the website on and after this day.
trans-unit.target: Do not show the news item on the website on and after this day.

trans-unit.source: This will add more options for meta informations.
trans-unit.target: This will add more options for meta informations.

trans-unit.source: Term will be inserted as meta title in detail page.
trans-unit.target: Term will be inserted as meta title in detail page.

trans-unit.source: Insert term with {{glossar::term}}. This setting will relace whole title!
trans-unit.target: Insert term with {{glossar::term}}. This setting will relace whole title!

trans-unit.source: This will be used as site description in details page.
trans-unit.target: This will be used as site description in details page.

trans-unit.source: Add an image to the content element.
trans-unit.target: Add an image to the content element.

trans-unit.source: Overwrite the meta data from the file manager.
trans-unit.target: Overwrite the meta data from the file manager.

trans-unit.source: Please select a file or folder from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Please select a file or folder from the files directory.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter an alternate text for the image (alt attribute).
trans-unit.target: Here you can enter an alternate text for the image (alt attribute).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the image title (title attribute).
trans-unit.target: Here you can enter the image title (title attribute).

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the image dimensions and the resize mode.
trans-unit.target: Here you can set the image dimensions and the resize mode.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left margin.
trans-unit.target: Here you can enter the top, right, bottom and left margin.

trans-unit.source: A custom image link target will override the lightbox link, so the image cannot be viewed fullsize anymore.
trans-unit.target: A custom image link target will override the lightbox link, so the image cannot be viewed fullsize anymore.

trans-unit.source: Open the full-size image in a lightbox or the link in a new browser window.
trans-unit.target: Open the full-size image in a lightbox or the link in a new browser window.

trans-unit.source: Please specify how to align the image.
trans-unit.target: Please specify how to align the image.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a short text that will be displayed below the image.
trans-unit.target: Here you can enter a short text that will be displayed below the image.

trans-unit.source: Here you can overwrite the default layer template.
trans-unit.target: Here you can overwrite the default layer template.

trans-unit.source: Add rel="canonical" for this page in head section.
trans-unit.target: Add rel="canonical" for this page in head section.

trans-unit.source: Please enter one or more tags comma separated here.
trans-unit.target: Please enter one or more tags comma separated here.
